medical_history.chief_complaint: Visual field defect in the left eye
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient has a 2-week history of a visual field defect. Previous visual loss was noted at age 5 years in the right eye due to a retinal hemangioma.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Large hemangioma involving the right retina, upper face, lower face, and upper neck at age 3 months; experienced vision loss in the right eye at age 5 years due to retinal hemangioma.
